resources.string:
This App allows to let your device automatically connect to another one via bluetooth from notification. This is useful if you use bluetooth tethering with a wlan only device (e.g. Transformer Prime) and a smartphone. To do so follow this instructions:
1) Pair both devices
2) Enable Bluetooth tethering on the phone(Settings -> More -> Tethering / Mobile Hotspot -> Bluetooth-Tethering)
